notification.name: serviceUnresponsive
notification.text-message: The %service% poll to interface %interface% successfully completed a connection to the service listener on the remote machine. However, the synthetic transaction failed to complete within %parm[timeout]% milliseconds, over %parm[attempts]% attempts. This event will NOT impact service level agreements, but may be an indicator of other problems on that node. You have 15 minutes to acknowledge this message before this notification will escalate to the next recipient.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %service% service on %interface% is unresponsive.

notification.name: serviceResponsive
notification.text-message: The %service% service on %interface% has recovered from a previously UNRESPONSIVE state. Synthetic transactions to this service are completing within the alotted timeout and retry period.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %service% service on %interface% has recovered.

notification.name: interfaceDown
notification.text-message: All services are down on interface %interface%. New Outage records have been created and service level availability calculations will be impacted until this outage is resolved. You have been notified by OpenNMS and you must acknowledge this notification within 15 minutes to prevent escalation.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %interface% down.

notification.name: nodeDown
notification.text-message: All services are down on node %parm[nodelabel]%. New Outage records have been created and service level availability calculations will be impacted until this outage is resolved. You have been notified by OpenNMS and you must acknowledge this notification within 15 minutes to prevent escalation.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: node %parm[nodelabel]% down.

notification.name: interfaceUp
notification.text-message: The interface %interface% which was previously down is now up.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Interface %interface% has been cleared

notification.name: nodeUp
notification.text-message: The node %parm[nodelabel]% which was previously down is now up.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Node %parm[nodelabel]% has been cleared.

notification.name: nodeLostService
notification.text-message: The %service% service poll on interface %interface% failed at %time%. You have been notified by OpenNMS and you must acknowledge this notification within 15 minutes to prevent escalation.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %service% down on %interface%.

notification.name: coldStart
notification.text-message: An SNMP coldStart trap has been received from interface %snmphost%. This indicates that the box has been powered up.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %snmphost% powered up.

notification.name: warmStart
notification.text-message: An SNMP warmStart trap has been received from interface %snmphost%. This indicates that the box has been rebooted.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %snmphost% rebooted.

notification.name: authenticationFailure
notification.text-message: An Authentication Failure has been identified on network device %snmphost%. This message is usually generated by an authentication failure during a user login attempt or an SNMP request failed due to incorrect community string.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: [OpenNMS] Authentication Failure on %snmphost%.

notification.name: serviceDeleted
notification.text-message: Due to extended downtime, the %service% service on interface %interface% has been deleted from OpenNMS's polling database.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %interface%'s %service% service deleted.

notification.name: nodeAdded
notification.text-message: OpenNMS has discovered a new node named %parm[nodelabel]%. Please be advised.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: %parm[nodelabel]% discovered.

notification.name: nodeInfoChanged
notification.text-message: Node information has changed for a device in your network. The new information is included: System Name: %parm[nodesysname]% System Description: %parm[nodesysdescription]% System Object Identifier: %parm[nodesysobjectid]% System Location: %parm[nodesyslocation]% System Contact: %parm[nodesyscontact]% NetBIOS Name: %parm[nodenetbiosname]%
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: Node information changed.

notification.name: interfaceDeleted
notification.text-message: Due to extended downtime, the interface %interface% has been deleted from OpenNMS's polling database.
notification.subject: Notice #%noticeid%: [OpenNMS] %interface% deleted.
